Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 64th overall pick, by Capital City in 1964...
Had first career hit (double) on 8/26/1969, off Samuel Poitra (Ash)...
Injured on 8/23/1971 with a Bruised Finger, out for 3 days...
Hit first career homerun on 4/22/1973, off Darrell Muldoon (PON)...
Released by Capital City on 4/28/1981...
Signed as a free agent by Plum Grove on 7/21/1981 to a minor league contract...
Released by Plum Grove on 7/7/1982...
Signed as a free agent by Halifax on 3/1/1983 to a minor league contract.
Injured on 4/10/1984 with a Fractured Hand, out for 4 weeks...
